enchantment.enchiridion.channeling.descr: An enchantment that allows this Trident to summon a Lightning Bolt on impact, as long as it is currently raining or storming.
enchantment.enchiridion.impaling.descrip: An enchantment that increases this Trident's damage towards aquatic mobs and entities that are touching water.
enchantment.enchiridion.infinity.descrip: An enchantment that allows this Bow to shoot infinite normal arrows.
enchantment.enchiridion.thorns.descripti: An enchantment that causes attackers to take damage when they deal damage to this item's wearer, given that the attacker is within a short distance.
